trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZG016_04291_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Hierax would ask you a question with absolutely no ulterior motive whatsoever.
TEXT_AKTKZG016_04291_TODO_00<tab>/doubt the nymphai.
TEXT_AKTKZG016_04291_TODO_01<tab>Report to Hierax.
TEXT_AKTKZG016_04291_HIERAX_000_000<tab>Oho! You are Azem's familiar, are you not?
TEXT_AKTKZG016_04291_HIERAX_000_001<tab>I pose to you a question: imagine an object you truly desire lies before you. What do you do?
TEXT_AKTKZG016_04291_Q1_000_002<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKZG016_04291_A1_000_001<tab>Take it!
TEXT_AKTKZG016_04291_A1_000_002<tab>Shout “NEED”!
TEXT_AKTKZG016_04291_HIERAX_000_003<tab>I see... As rumored, you do show a glimmer of intelligence. Avarice is a mark of sentience, you know.

TEXT_AKTKZG016_04291_HIERAX_000_004<tab>Speaking of which, my pot of nectar has recently gone missing─along with the nymphai I was observing. Welcome as this confirmation of their intelligence is, they aren't meant to eat all of that at once.

TEXT_AKTKZG016_04291_HIERAX_000_005<tab>Of course, should I pursue them, they will like as not hide for fear of reprisal while they devour the lot. However, they may respond if a fellow familiar expresses <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>doubt<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> that so much nectar truly belongs to them...if you take my meaning.
TEXT_AKTKZG016_04291_HIERAX_000_006<tab>I believe I caught a glimpse of the nymphai surmounting the fence to the southwest... I assure you, you will know them when you see them.
TEXT_AKTKZG016_04291_BEAVERA04291_000_010<tab><squeal>?

TEXT_AKTKZG016_04291_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>The...nymphe?...squeaks innocently in response to your query, but you have ample reason to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>doubt<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> its sincerity...
TEXT_AKTKZG016_04291_BEAVERA04291_000_012<tab><squeal> <squeal> <squeal>!
TEXT_AKTKZG016_04291_SYSTEM_000_013<tab>The...nymphe?...squeals in a presumably disgruntled fashion and waddles away.
TEXT_AKTKZG016_04291_BEAVERB04291_000_014<tab><squeal>?

TEXT_AKTKZG016_04291_SYSTEM_000_015<tab>The...nymphe?...squeaks innocently in response to your query, but you have ample reason to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>doubt<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> its sincerity...
TEXT_AKTKZG016_04291_BEAVERB04291_000_016<tab><squeal>! <squeeeaaal>!
TEXT_AKTKZG016_04291_SYSTEM_000_017<tab>The...nymphe?...waddles away, but not before you catch a strong whiff of nectar.
TEXT_AKTKZG016_04291_BEAVERC04291_000_018<tab><squeal>?

TEXT_AKTKZG016_04291_SYSTEM_000_019<tab>The...nymphe?...squeaks innocently in response to your query, but you have ample reason to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>doubt<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> its sincerity...
TEXT_AKTKZG016_04291_BEAVERC04291_000_020<tab><squeal> <squeal>!
TEXT_AKTKZG016_04291_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>The...nymphe?...waddles away, looking rather pleased with itself.
TEXT_AKTKZG016_04291_HIERAX_000_025<tab>You've returned! But where are my nymphai?
TEXT_AKTKZG016_04291_Q2_000_026<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKZG016_04291_A2_000_001<tab>You should probably forget about those.
TEXT_AKTKZG016_04291_A2_000_002<tab>B-Beavers...
TEXT_AKTKZG016_04291_HIERAX_000_027<tab>What in the world are you talking about? Come now, tell me what you saw. Spare no detail─I'm a professional.
TEXT_AKTKZG016_04291_HIERAX_000_028<tab>Strange, brown-furred creatures? That <var 1A 02 /var>waddled<var 1A 01 /var>!?
TEXT_AKTKZG016_04291_HIERAX_000_029<tab>My nymphai were bright, and winged, a-and─ Oh... Oh, no...
TEXT_AKTKZG016_04291_HIERAX_000_030<tab>No... No, that's absurd... Ha ha... Ha ha ha...
TEXT_AKTKZG016_04291_HIERAX_000_031<tab>Tell no one of this. Some things are better off lost.
